item.value: I will create a task and enable in plan to check this problem. As soon as information becomes available, I will let you know.
I will create a task and set up in plan to check this problem. As soon as information becomes available, I will let you know.
Я создам задачу на проверку этой проблемы. Как появится информация, я сообщу вам.
I set up a redirect and the problem should go away.
I think I found the problem. Users from mobile devices got to the version of the site with the http protocol. Set up a redirect and the problem should go away.
Я думаю я нашёл проблему. Пользователи с мобильных устройств попадали на версию сайта с http протоколом. Настроил редирект и проблема должна уйти.
what os are the users with the problem using?
Какую ОС используют пользователи с проблемой?

When a successful payment method is saved, Stripe server is supposed to contact bidspirit server and give the user card details. until this process is complete the card is not saved in bidspirit. You need to wait until bidspirit server confirms it received a valid payment method. This is done by the api userspaymentMethodscheckPaymentMethodSaved with the stripePaymentMethodId you got in the previous stage. this method will return a success, error or pending reply. in case of a pending reply - wait one second and call the api again.
gets a secret for stripe js api, which will allow the user to add a payment method
portant note. I did not save these payment methods using userspaymentMethodscheckPaymentMethodSaved
Важное замечание. Эти методы оплаты я не сохранял с помощью userspaymentMethodscheckPaymentMethodSaved
true if the payment method was not saved. in this case you need to call this api again after one second

in the handle response function you can check if there was an error in the payment method submission. if there is no error, you should get a stripePaymentMethodId variable from the response object:
Как я могу удалить добавленные способами оплаты пользователя на Bidspirit портале?
handle Response
if required
открыто ранее
if the user tried to enter a card of a blocked user
extanshion Checkout
denied Callback

if this field contains a value you need to show an error message to the user. possible values: ALREADY_EXISTS (if the user already have this payment method) NOT_ALLOWED (if the user tried to enter a card of a blocked user) or GENERAL_ERROR

Removes a user payment method. NOTE! if a user used a payment method to get approval for an auction his approval would be canceled. the user should be warned about this before he proceeds with the payment method deletion. Also - a user cannot remove his payment method if he has unpaid bills, or absentee bids in non ended auctions (if he will try the server would return an error PAYMENT_METHOD_IN_USE).
